resources.string: The compressed Image will be saved in the same directory as the original image with \'compressed\' appended to the start of its name

Since you\'re trying to resize and compress more than one image, It\'d be wise to make sure the selected images are at-least of the same size. The size below is extracted from the first image only and will be applied to all the selected images
A slower preset will provide better compression (compression is quality per filesize) but take more time!
A lower value is a higher quality and a subjectively sane range is 18-28.
